official_title: A bill to amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to provide for drug abuse therapy programs in schools.
short_title: Elementary and Secondary Drug Abuse Eradication Act of 1979

summary.text: Elementary and Secondary Drug Abuse Eradication Act of 1979 - Amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to direct the Commissioner of Education to establish a program of grants to local educational agencies for programs to combat the use of drugs by elementary and secondary students. Sets forth application guidelines including: (1) counseling; (2) group therapy and peer groups; (3) parental involvement; and (4) in-service training of school personnel in drug abuse.
